moves.1. e4: Typical. This is the only move I do, which may be inflexible, but 'Best by Test'.
moves.8... Qe7: I don't think he should have brought his queen out so early.
moves.11... Bxf3 12. Qxf3: gxf3 would have been bad, as it would expose my king.
moves.13. Bxf6: Now black must get doubled pawns.
moves.13... gxf6 14. Qxf6: Bringing my queen into play. Would bringing it out in this situation usually be bad?
moves.15... Be7: ?? I can see why black wanted to do this, but he won't get to kill my queen, as I will check him.
